document.docAuthor: García-Garza, María Elena, León-González, Jesús Angel De & Tovar-Hernández, María Ana
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of Notomastus M. Sars, 1851 (Annelida, Capitellidae) and the description of a new species from the Gulf of California

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of Notomastus M. Sars, 1851 (Annelida, Capitellidae) and the description of a new species from the Gulf of California

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks:
Notomastus latericeus
was considered a cosmopolitan species by Day (1967) , Thomassin (1970) and Ewing (1984) , but it is necessary to confirm these records.
